title: Carter and Briggs
description: Carter and Briggs are seasoned police partners who drive donuts around criminals.
altHero: Carter and Briggs laughing in their cop car with a perp in the back
alt1: Briggs holding a man against the hood of his car while holding his wallet
alt3: Carter and Briggs driving donuts in their cop car in a warehouse, surrounded by criminals in ski masks
alt4: Carter firing a gun out his window
